snippet.title: Slender: The Eight Pages -- Game Teaser
snippet.description:
*** PLEASE NOTE: VIDEO IS FROM V0.9 ***

A short, experimental horror game based on the Slender Man mythos.  (Currently in beta v0.9.7)

http://www.parsecproductions.net/slender/

Development forum: http://slenderdev.proboards.com/

T-shirts now available: http://slender.spreadshirt.com/

New game -- SLENDER: THE ARRIVAL -- http://www.slenderarrival.com/
